Posts.Content: Hello, My name is Carla San Roman. My mother was diagnosed with breast cancer at the end of last year. She is now having her chemotherapy treatment within the next few days. I'm a student graduating at San Francisco State University. For my senior thesis research project, my topic is on Electronic Resources for Breast Cancer Patients. My study is focusing on whether having a website for breast cancer patients is an effective way for patients to gather their information. I have conducted a survey and would like breast cancer patients and breast cancer survivors opinions. Here is the link to the survey: <link deleted as per policy> Thank you for your time, Carla San Roman San Francisco State University Student
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Patient Survey
